prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green wings and a slender body.
Imagine a flying Pokemon that has a unique leaf-like appearance and is small in size.
Design a small dragon-like creature with intricate patterns on its wings.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in forests, showcasing bright green and yellow colors.
Show me a vibrant insectoid Pokemon that resembles a dragonfly with large wings.
Make a Pokemon that has both insect and dragon traits, perfect for forest habitats.
Give me a bug/flying type Pokemon with a distinctive green and yellow color scheme.
